solution_line_template: If he reserves {reserved_space} sq. ft. of space for a desk and some walking space, then he will have {total_room_space}-{reserved_space}=<<{total_room_space}-{reserved_space}={remaining_space}>>{remaining_space} sq. ft. of space remaining.

If each bookshelf takes up {space_per_bookshelf} sq. ft. of space, then {remaining_space} sq ft can contain {remaining_space}/{space_per_bookshelf}=<<{remaining_space}/{space_per_bookshelf}={num_bookshelves}>>{num_bookshelves} bookshelves.
